data.text: @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @GovernmentZA As a mother of two kids I have battled alot with my financial state to the point of begging from friends just to survive,until I started Bitcoin trading with the help of @cynthianeliwe made a successful withdrawal of R 200,000 with the help of @cynthianeliwe
@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @GovernmentZA You declined my February payment even though you know that IEC hired us for 1Day😭
@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @GovernmentZA My status still shows pending from February,  why is that?
@Anelisamatshob1 @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @GovernmentZA Sassa udlala nje ngabantu yena qha kubenzima solve problem for 6 months
@Anelisamatshob1 @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @GovernmentZA 🤔My sister is experiencing the same problem and they don't respond to DMs

@mphomakitla @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @GovernmentZA Instead of giving us an automated response...please ,a request from the over qualified, graduates,unemployed and poor South Africans, rather uMaZulu or Memela rather they respond to our concerns, as uPaseka Letsatsi is not saying much..we need  to be responded too.
